#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	int T;
	int c;
	int count;
	
	scanf("%d",&T);
	getchar();
	while(T--)
	{
		count=0;
		
		while((c=getchar())!='\n')
		{
			if(c==' ')
			{
				count++;
			}
		}
		
		printf("%d\n",count+1);
	}
	return 0;
}
